Name: Strike
Text: Strike

Name: Move
Text: Maneuver

Name: Defend
Text: Defend

Name: Wind jump
Text: Range 5. Target ally is removed from play. They appear at the start of the next round at any space within Range 5 from you. You may Consume Air to Knockback 1 all enemies adjacent to them when they appear.

Name: Blow off
Text: Maneuver. Radius 2. Knockback 2.

Name: Air blade
Text: Consume Air. Range 4. Strike. Inflict 2 Bleed.

Name: Tempest strike
Text: Maneuver. Strike. Maneuver. Channel Air.

Name: Tailwind
Text: Radius 1. Consume Air to increase Radius by 2. All allies may Move 3 and gain Evasive 1.

Name: Billowing
Text: Consume Air. Continuous. Any number of times during your turn, you may discard a card. When you do, Move 1.

Name: Sacrificial stab
Text: Lose 2 Life. Strike. Channel Dark.

Name: Draining touch
Text: Deal 1d6 damage. Consume Dark to gain life equal to damage dealt. Exile.

Name: Release pain
Text: Pay X life. This attack hits allies. Radius X. Deal 4d6 dark damage.

Name: Blood pact
Text: Permanent. End of turn - Lose 2 life and gain Empowered 1.

Name: Murderous aura
Text: Continuous. Radius 1. Whenever an ally attacks, you lose 1 life and they deal an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Shadow's grasp
Text: Range 5. Up to three targets. Deal 1d6 damage and inflict Soft 2. Channel Dark.

Name: Bury
Text: Strike. Target can't move until the end of its next turn. Channel Earth.

Name: Cracking skin
Text: Continuous. Defend. When attacked, create a Size 1 obstacle within Range 3.

Name: Blessing of stone
Text: Consume Earth. Radius 3. All friendly characters gain 5 Block.

Name: Stone cage
Text: Radius 3. Create Size 3 walls around the radius. Inflict Slow 3. While no walls are destroyed and you are inside them, deal an extra 2d6 Earth damage on your attacks.

Name: Pocket cover
Text: Range 2. Create a Size 1 obstacle. Channel Earth.

Name: Dig
Text: Put a card from your discard into your hand.

Name: Reuse
Text: Shuffle any number of cards from your discard into your deck.

Name: Forward strike
Text: Strike. Exile the top card of your deck. You may play it this turn. Channel Fire.

Name: Sear
Text: Range 5. Blast 2. Deal an extra 1d6 damage to any non-bloodied enemies. Deal 1d6 fire damage.

Name: Burn bright
Text: Draw three cards. Consume Fire to play a card costing 1 or less from your hand for free.

Name: Blazing armamanet
Text: Continuous. Range 3. Target ally deals an extra 1d6 Fire damage.

Name: Cauterize
Text: Deal 1 Fire damage. Target loses all Bleed. Draw a card.

Name: Engulf in flames
Text: Range 3. Inflict Burn on target ally. Their next attack gains Radius 1 and deals an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Frost aura
Text: Permanent. Whenever an enemy starts their turn next to you, they gain Slow 1. Channel Ice.

Name: Snow day
Text: Radius 3. Create difficult terrain. Consume Ice to deal 1d6 Ice damage.

Name: Frost strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Slow 2. Channel Ice.

Name: Frost beam
Text: Consume Ice. Line 4. Deal 3d6 damage. Create difficult terrain.

Name: Skating
Text: Continuous. Radius 5. Friendly characters ignore movement cost increase on difficult terrain. When they end their turn on difficult terrain, they gain 2 Block.

Name: Ice armor
Text: Opener. Defend. Gain Slow 1. Channel Ice.

Name: Balance
Text: Stance. Whenever you Strike, gain 1 Barrier. Whenever you Defend, your next attack deals an extra 1d6 damage.

Name: Bestow armor
Text: Range 5. Target gains 5 Block. Channel Light.

Name: Soft wrappings
Text: Target gains 2 Barrier. You may Consume Light to Heal 2 instead. Target draws a card. Exile.

Name: Light strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Pulse 3. Channel Light.

Name: Reveal
Text: Range 5. Target ally searches their deck for a card and puts it into their hand. You may consume Light to target a second ally. Exile.

Name: Smite
Text: Consume Light. Range 10. Ignores line of sight. Deal 2d6 light damage. Inflict Pulse 2.

Name: Gleaming strike
Text: Scan, then Strike the target.

Name: Disect
Text: Strike. If you defeat the enemy, search your deck for a card and put it on top of your deck.

Name: Chain lightning
Text: Range 5. Deal 3d6 lightning damage. Another target within Range 3 takes 2d6 lightning  damage. Another target within Range 3 from the second target takes 1d6 lightning damage. Channel Lightning.

Name: Shocking wave
Text: Radius 1. You may consume Lightning to increase radius by 2. Deal 2d6 lightning damage to all other characters.

Name: Crackling
Text: Permanent. Start of turn - gain 2 Counter. Your counter deals Lightning damage.

Name: Distracting strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Distracted until the end of its turn.

Name: Spectacle
Text: Affects all enemies in line of sight. Inflict Distracted until the end of their turn. Consume Lightning to gain 3 Counter.

Name: Wreathe in Electricity
Text: Consume Lightning. Radius 3. All allies gain 4 Counter.

Name: Lightning bolt
Text: Consume Lightning. Line 5. Affects allies and enemies. Deal 4d6 damage and inflict 3 Sundered.

Name: Venomous strike
Text: Strike. Inflict Poison 3. Channel Nature.

Name: Poison plants
Text: Range 3. Create 2 Size 2 obstacles. Enemies starting their turn adjacent to them gain Poison 2 and Slow 1.

Name: Natural remedy
Text: Consume Nature. Target recovers 2 Health and removes up to one condition. Exile.

Name: Poison coating
Text: Permanent. Your attacks inflict 1 Poison.

Name: Soothe plant
Text: Range 6. Create a Size 1 obstacle. When a friendly character ends their turn next to it, they remove up to 1 condition or status card from their hand.

Name: Toxiburst
Text: Range 5. Blast 1. Inflict Soft 2, Slow 1 and Poison 1. Channel Nature.

Name: Clarity
Text: Draw cards until you have 6 in hand. Channel Water

Name: Current
Text: Range 5. Move target up to 3. The area it moves over turns into difficult terrain that moves a character ending their turn there the same direction and spaces.

Name: Geyser strike
Text: Strike. Knockback 1. If the space the target was on is empty, it becomes water terrain that cannot be walked on.

Name: Drink
Text: Consume Water. Draw 2 cards.

Name: Waterport
Text: Range 7. Swap positions of any two characters.

Name: Wave of thought
Text: Radius 5. Each ally draws a card. You may consume Water to move them 2 towards you.

Name: Run
Text: Maneuver +2.

Name: Slink
Text: Maneuver -1. Draw 1

Name: Running reload
Text: Maneuver. Reload 2.

Name: Easy reposition
Text: Maneuver.

Name: Easy step
Text: Maneuver, ignoring difficult terrain and height.

Name: Jump
Text: Maneuver. You may move up. You may play a card as you descend. If you strike as you descend, deal an extra 2d6 damage.

Name: Flick
Text: Range 3. Deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Refine
Text: Continuous. Your attacks deal +X damage, where X is the number of times you've played this card this combat.

Name: Blade dig
Text: Draw a card. Repeat this process until you draw a non-attack card.

Name: Lengthy strike
Text: Line 3. Strike. Knockback 1.

Name: Bursting strike
Text: Burst 2. Strike.

Name: Unload
Text: Strike with an Ammo weapon until you run out of Ammo. You may not reload with these strikes.

Name: Lucky roll
Text: Reaction - any die is rolled. Change the die up or down by 1.

Name: Heart of the cards
Text: Play the top card of your deck for free, then exile it.

Name: All in
Text: The next time you attack, roll 1d6. On 4+, deal double damage. Otherwise, deal no damage.

Name: Thoughtful strike
Text: Strike. You may consume Water or Light. Radius 3. Each ally may draw a card.

Name: Stone cold defense
Text: Defend. You may consume Ice or Earth. Radius 3. Each ally gains 3 Block.

Name: Creeping tendrils
Text: Range 5. Deal 1d6 damage to up to 3 targets. You may consume Nature or Dark. Gain half of the damage roll health.

Name: Blitz
Text: Line 5. Deal 1d6 damage to each target moved through.. You may consume Lightning or Air. Move to the end of the line.

Name: Bursting
Text: Consume Lightning or Fire. Radius 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Gain 2 Counter.

Name: Mass expulsion
Text: Radius 3. Inflict 3 Pulse on each character. You may consume Light or Fire. Radius 3. Trigger Pulse on each character and reduce it by 1.

Name: Beast form
Text: Stance. You may not use weapons to strike. Your Strike becomes “Deal 2d6 damage. Deal 1d6 damage.” You gain 3 Block at the start of each turn. Your attacks deal an extra 1d6 against non-bloodied enemies.

Name: Flicker blow
Text: Strike. Teleport 3 to be adjacent to another target. Strike that target.

Name: Melt legs
Text: Range 5. Burst 2. Inflict 2 Soft and 2 Slow.

Name: Control magic
Text: Range 5. You control the target on their next turn.

Name: Chromatic strike
Text: Strike. Inflict 3 of a random status effect - d6 - 1-2 Bleed, 3-4 Poison, 5-6 Pulse.

Name: Prod fortune
Text: Radius 6. For each character, inflict them with 3 of a random status effect d6 1 Counter, 2 Soft 3 Barrier 4 Bleed 5 Poison 6 Pulse

Name: Reload
Text: Reload 3.

Name: Hot reload
Text: Reload 1. Draw a card. Gain 2 Pulse.

Name: Demand
Text: Continuous. Range 5. Target enemy must target you with all abilities if able as long as it starts its turn within range.

Name: Be loud
Text: Continuous. Radius 3. Each enemy must target you if able.

Name: Drawing stance
Text: Stance. Radius 3. Each enemy must target you if able.

Name: Vanguard's assault
Text: Strike. If you are bloodied, Defend. Gain 3 Counter.

Name: Probing blow
Text: Scan target within Strike range, then Strike or Draw 2 cards.

Name: Singe brain
Text: Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 Burn.

Name: Toxic lesson
Text: Range 3. Inflict 3 Poison to target friendly character. They draw 2 cards.

Name: Charge
Text: Maneuver. Strike an adjacent enemy.

Name: Deflect
Text: Reaction - you are attacked by a non-adjacent enemy. Redirect the attack to any other target within Range 3.

Name: Nothingness strike
Text: Discard two cards. If you do, Strike.

Name: Unceasing
Text: Permanent. When you have no cards in hand, lose 1 life and draw a card.

Name: Siphon mind
Text: Radius 5. Each character discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way. Channel Dark.

Name: Use waste
Text: Stance. Whenever you discard a card, gain 1 Block.

Name: Deadzone
Text: Radius 3. For each enemy, teleport to that enemy, then Strike them.

Name: Blade rush
Text: Line 3. Strike and inflict 3 Bleed, then move to the end of the line.

Name: Attack of oportunity
Text: Reaction - An adjacent enemy moves. Strike that enemy.

Name: Beat down
Text: Reaction - an ally attacks an adjacent enemy. Strike that enemy and inflict 2 Soft.

Name: Reflect projectile
Text: Reaction - a non-adjacent enemy attacks you. Gain resistance to the attack and damage the attacker for the same amount.

Name: Swift block
Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Defend.

Name: Bloody twirl
Text: Lose 2 Life. Strike. If you are bloodied, the attack gains Radius 1.

Name: Evasive strike
Text: Strike. Gain 1 Evasive.

Name: Mark target
Text: Range 5. Permanent. Attacks against the target deal 1d6 extra damage. When the target dies, exile.

Name: Time walk
Text: Take an extra turn after this one. Finisher. Exile.

Name: Shell
Text: Continuous. Radius 3. Allies deal 3 more damage.

Name: Follow-up
Text: Continuous. Once per turn, when an ally attacks an enemy within range 3, you may deal 1d3 damage to that enemy. If you're adjacent to the enemy, deal 1d6 damage instead.

Name: Power in pain
Text: Lose 2 Life. Gain 1 Strength

Name: Empowering Blow
Text: Strike. Radius 3. Each ally gains 1 Empowered. If you defeat the enemy, they gain another 1 Empowered.

Name: Black hole
Text: Range 6, Burst 3. All elements are consumed. Pull all targets as close to the center as possible. Deal 5d6 damage. Gain 1 Nihil. Exile.

Name: Cover
Text: Reaction - an ally within range 3 is attacked. Swap spaces with that ally and take the attack in their place.

Name: Calling the Doves down to the sinners and allowing the bliss to flow
Text: Deal 1 damage to any target regardless of range or line of sight. Repeat 107 times. Gain 3 Wounds.

Name: Pointy tossaways
Text: Stance. Whenever you discard a card, Range 3 - deal 1 damage.

Name: Endless blades
Text: Stance. Once per turn, you may deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Indiscriminate pulsation
Text: Stance. Your Pulse deals damage to all characters in the radius.

Name: Grit
Text: Permanent. When you would be defeated, gain a wound and remain at 1 Health instead. Then, exile this.

Name: My beating, exposed heart
Text: Stance. At the end of your turn Radius 3 - you and all enemies gain 1 Vulnerable.

Name: Defensive antidote
Text: Defend. Remove all Poison from any character.

Name: Gushing guard
Text: Defend. If you have any Bleed, Radius 3 - Inflict 3 Bleed, trigger Bleed damage on each character, then reduce Bleed by 1.

Name: Insightful defend
Text: Defend. Radius 1. Each friendly character draws a card.

Name: Horde holder
Text: Continuous. Your zone of control is increased by 2. Whenever a character enters your zone of control, Defend.

Name: Pulsing guard
Text: Continuous. Defend. Whenever you are attacked, gain 1 Pulse. Your Pulse deals damage to enemies.

Name: Bleeding guard
Text: Defend. Gain 2 Bleed.

Name: Inviting defense
Text: Defend. Any enemy regardless of distance may Move 2, then attack you with a basic attack.

Name: Reusing guard
Text: Exile the top card of your deck. Defend X times, where X is its cost.

Name: Sleight of hand
Text: Draw a card, then put a card on top of your deck.

Name: Shield the wounded
Text: Radius 3. Defend, allies gaining all effects of your Defend too. This costs 1 less for each Bloodied friendly character within range.

Name: Wound
Text: Unplayable.

Name: Bladestorm
Text: Continuous. Whenever you Strike, deal 1d6 damage.

Name: Teaching waters
Text: Range 5. An ally draws 5 cards. Channel Water.

Name: Divesting order
Text: Exile the top 2 cards of your deck. Range 3 - target ally Strikes.

Name: Offense order
Text: Radius 3. All friendly characters may Strike an adjacent character.

Name: Targeted destruction
Text: Range 5. Any number of allies may Strike the target.

Name: Breaking combo
Text: Strike. Knockback 1, then Move 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Inflict 3 Soft. Radius 1 - Strike.

Name: Trusting motion
Text: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an attack, gain 1 Strength and Strike. If it's a Move, gain 2 Haste and Maneuver. If it's a Defend, gain 3 Hard and Defend. Otherwise, gain 1 Energy and draw a card.

Name: Elementor
Text: Stance. Whenever you consume an element, you may have an ally within range 3 deal +1d6 damage and their damage is of that type.

Name: Guard
Text: Range 3. Defend.

Name: Oportune strike
Text: Replenish. Strike. Discard a card.

Name: Liminal flow
Text: Consume Dark and Light. Continuous. Radius 3 - Friendly characters' attacks deal +1d6 damage and deal Dark or Light damage of your choice. Whenever they defeat an enemy, they recover 1 Health.

Name: Burning frost
Text: Consume Fire and Ice. Continuous. Radius 3 - Whenever an enemy starts or ends their turn, inflict 2 Slow and 4 Pulse.

Name: Shadow call
Text: Range 3 - Create a Shade (3 HP). It deals 1d6 damage. Consume Dark - each Shade moves 2, then deals 1d6 damage.

Name: Summon Golem
Text: Permanent. Range 3 - Summon a Golem (15 HP, Size 2, Immune to Poison and Bleed). It deals 2d6 damage. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Energy. When you do, the summoned Golem moves 2, then deals 2d6 damage and you may consume Ice or Earth to have the Golem gain 5 Block. When the Golem is defeated, Exile this.

Name: Guide creation
Text: Range 5. Target summoned ally recovers 3 health, may move 2 and its next attack deals +1d6 damage. Channel Light.

Name: Summon Elemental
Text: Permanent. Consume Fire or Lightning. Range 3 - Summon an Elemental (8 HP). At the end of your turn it moves 4, gains 3 Counter and deals 2d6 damage.

Name: Barrier potion
Text: Replenish. Gain 5 Barrier. Consumable 3.

Name: Bandages
Text: Replenish. Remove all Bleed from a friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Antidote
Text: Replenish. Remove all Poison from a Friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Dampener
Text: Replenish. Remove all Pulse from a Friendly character. Consumable 3.

Name: Strength potion
Text: Replenish. Gain 2 Strength. Consumable 3.

Name: Strand of wind
Text: Replenish. Gain 5 Barrier. Consumable 3.

Name: Throwing dagger
Text: Replenish. Range 3. Deal 1d6 damage. Consumable 3.

Name: Blade ring
Text: Replenish. Radius 1. Deal 1d6 damage. Consumable 3.

Name: Stone of elements
Text: Replenish. Channel any element. Consumable 3.
